section.title: Enabling Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Host
section.para: Enable Capacity & Utilization data collection for a Host.

procedure.title: To Enable Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Host

step.para: From the right pane, select C & U Collection.

listitem.para: To enable capacity and utilization data collection for all the Hosts in a Cluster, select the Cluster from the list under Enable Collection by Cluster.

To enable capacity and utilization data collection by a Host, choose the desired Host from the list under the Cluster selected from Enable Collection by Cluster. Data is collected for a Cluster and all of its Hosts when at least one Host is selected.
